features: Kid-Friendly Tangerine Tango Flavor: Forget the bitter aftertaste of traditional iron supplements. These delicious orange flavored tablets will have kids jumping to take their iron.

Sugar-Free: Compared to traditional gummies and chewables, our quick dissolving tablets are sugar-free. Our zero-sugar formula is sweetened with monk fruit extract to make a yummy and healthy vitamin.
Fast-Dissolving Tablets: Our fastest dissolving tablet yet, these are perfect for even the pickiest of kids. Make life easier for kids and parents.

Higher Absorption: Ferronyl/Elemental carbonyl iron powder is a safe and gentle iron therapy. With greater bioavailability of iron than other forms of iron, carbonyl iron is the optimal choice with minimal side effects. Vitamin C is added to aid absorption and prevent upset tummies, nausea, or constipation.
Made in the USA: Free of sugars, GMO products, and dyes. All natural flavors and sweeteners.
body.description: NutritiPure's Iron plus vitamin C is pleasant tasting Orange flavor tablet that quickly dissolves in mouth. Each bottle contains 90 tablets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 9 yr old loves these. She says they taste great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Hey, we as parents know that iron pill anything with kids is hard to deal with. It tastes nasty and gets spat out, only to stain everything. I got these as a last effort to get some iron in my kid since she is a picky eater. Well, she eats them! Now, they aren't amazing in taste but they are leagues above Flintstones, liquids, and other tablets. I just call them morning candy and she eats them. There is a little bit of a fight as I do have to keep it in her mouth but these have been the easiest to eat so far!So far in the few days we have been taking them she sleeps a little better and has more energy. I do need to get her iron in her food, but with a picky eater, this is been helping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for picky kids!
reviews.reviewText: My four year old autistic son will actually eat this one!He’s actually pretty good about eating meds if needed, but the flint stone ones he would not touch! And I cannot blame him, they’re disgusting with the iron! -Try one if you have a kid refusing them, they leave a terrible tasteThese ones actually don’t taste disgusting and work out great cause he’ll just eat them up so I no longer have to worry about fighting him with taking his iron he needs. Yeah

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to swallow
reviews.reviewText: Taste was fine, texture good, my granddaughter has some oral issues but had no problem chewing and swallowing them. No strong smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These cured my 15 month old daughters anemia!!
reviews.reviewText: We found out my daughter was anemic at her 15 month well child. Her doctor prescribed her Iron Drops and they were disgusting so she wouldn’t even go near them no matter what I mixed them with. So I started looking for alternatives...found these and bought them. I put one tablet on her plate with breakfast every morning and she loves to eat her iron. It excites her! The tabs don’t melt in her mouth like they say they do, but my daughter seems to like chewing them up. When we re checked her iron levels at the doctor a month later, her level was beautiful at “13”. It’s supposed to be between 11-14. Before these tabs it was at 10. Her pediatrician was very impressed by these tablets and even asked me to send her the info on these tablets so that she could start recommending them to her other patients!! These are absolutely amazing and I’m SO glad I found them!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My toddler has issues with his iron levels (just like his mom I guess...) even with having toddler formula and a multivitamin at dinner he still wasn't getting there. And yes, we tried introducing iron rich foods but he's a picky taste & texture eater so this wasn't our answer. The pedi prescribed iron drops but warned they have an awful taste AND can stain his teeth. These chewable alongside his multivitamin have been exactly what we need to keep his levels within normal ranges. He doesn't mind the taste at all and makes sure WE don't forget to give it to him lol** Make sure to discuss with your Littles doctor first because TOO much iron can be dangerous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for my daughter
reviews.reviewText: These replaced a gummy my daughter tried and hated. She doesn't mind the flavor of these and takes them with ease every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tasting Iron Chewable!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 8 year old daughter who cannot swallow pills. Her doctor said her ferritin level was too low so he suggested she start on a suppliment. Shes been taking them for 2 weeks and has had no stomach issues. Its too soon to tell if theyre being absorbed or helping her yet so we’ll see. I will add that I ordered the orange flavored meltaway tablets and the tablets are purple. Im not sure if they are actually orange flavor or grape. My daughter is able to chew them up with no complaints so overall, we are happy!
